Additional features include double-wall insulated stainless steel that keeps drinks cold up to 24 hours, a carry loop that doubles as a lock, a cup holder-friendly base, and a wide opening for easy cleaning and adding ice. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid is available in three sizes: 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce. Lid is dishwasher safe; hand wash cup. America’s #1 Longwear Eyeliner.* Revlon ColorStay Eyeliner Pencil delivers rich, lasting color that looks freshly applied all day long, and glides on smoothly in totally wearable, everyday shades.
